name: 林嘉彤
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1 void
Week 2 How Holly Went ”Hollywood”
Week 3 Stronger Than an Elephant
Week 4 The Story of the Hamburger
Week 5 What an Actor!
Week 6 A Mystery Solved
Week 7 Hurricanes
Week 8 Making Money
Week 9 Midterm Exam
Week 10 A Short History of Sitcoms
Week 11 Queen of the Nile
Week 12 A Universal Language
Week 13 An Unusual Collaboration
Week 14 The Master Forger
Week 15 A Short Career
Week 16 Hearing Hazards
Week 17 Final Exam
Week 18 General English Proficiency Trial Test
scorePolicy:
In-class presentations and quizzes
Midterm and Final exams
